TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ScrollBar/GripperHorizontal extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the grip of a horizontal scroll box (also known as the thumb). This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the grip of a horizontal scroll box.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.GripperHorizontal.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#105](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/e5d243bb-c637-41e7-8c3e-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#105](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/e5d243bb-c637-41e7-8c3e-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a grip for a horizontal scroll box.
Docs.value: A that represents a grip for a horizontal scroll box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarGripperHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#105](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/9b60a0e2-a103-4893-9271-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#105](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/9b60a0e2-a103-4893-9271-_1.vb)]
